objects.name: NewText
objects.string:
Help  the  easter  bunny  collect  all 
of  his  eggs.  But  be  careful!  Try  to
avoid  all  the  traps  and  foxes.
They  will  hurt  the  easter  bunny.
You  can  shoot  the  foxes  with  easter
bunny's  special  carrots  so  they  no 
longer  can  hurt  you.  When  you 
collected  all  the  eggs  go  to  the 
finish  flag.
Have  fun!

content.text:
Help  the  easter  bunny  collect  all 
of  his  eggs.  But  be  careful!  Try  to
avoid  all  the  traps  and  foxes.
They  will  hurt  the  easter  bunny.
You  can  shoot  the  foxes  with  easter
bunny's  special  carrots  so  they  no 
longer  can  hurt  you.  When  you 
collected  all  the  eggs  go  to  the 
finish  flag.
Have  fun!

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FireBullet
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading and overheating.
description: This extension allows objects to fire bullets.
- Firing multiple bullets at a time ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://fire-bullet))
A simple example shows how to make firing patterns ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://firing-patterns)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheating.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FireBullet

events.comment: Creators can use the "FireBullet" action multiple times in a frame and it will be counted as a single "shot".
Subtract 1 from ammo (if not unlimited ammo)
Only reload the amount of ammo available

events.name: Reduce heat level (based on cooling rate)

eventsFunctions.description: Fire bullets toward an object.
eventsFunctions.name: FireTowardObject
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, toward _PARAM5_ with speed _PARAM6_ px/s

events.name: Calculate the trajectory angle and use the "Fire bullets" action

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: Fire bullets toward a position.
eventsFunctions.name: FireTowardPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, toward position _PARAM5_;_PARAM6_ with speed _PARAM7_ px/s

events.name: Calculate the trajectory angle and use the "Fire bullets" action

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: Fire bullets in the direction of a given angle.
eventsFunctions.name: Fire
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, toward angle _PARAM5_ and speed _PARAM6_ px/s

events.comment: Move temp variable to the next angle a bullet will be sent

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Angle of the bullet, in degrees
parameters.name: Angle

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: Fire a single bullet. This is only meant to be used inside the "Fire bullet" action.
eventsFunctions.name: FireSingleBullet
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire a single bullet _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, with angle _PARAM5_ and speed _PARAM6_ px/s

events.comment: Move bullet (apply angle and bullet speed variances)
Add identifier variables (to enable advanced picking by users)
Rotate newly created bullet, if needed

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Angle of the bullet, in degrees
parameters.name: Angle

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: Reload ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: ReloadAmmo

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object has just fired something.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustFired

eventsFunctions.description: Check if bullet rotates to match trajectory.
eventsFunctions.name: BulletRotationEnabled

eventsFunctions.description: the firing arc (in degrees) where bullets are shot. Bullets are evenly spaced out inside the firing arc.
eventsFunctions.name: FiringArc

eventsFunctions.description: Change the firing arc (in degrees) where bullets will be shot. Bullets will be evenly spaced out inside the firing arc.
eventsFunctions.name: SetFiringArc
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set firing arc of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ degrees

eventsFunctions.description: the angle variance (in degrees) applied to each bullet.
eventsFunctions.name: AngleVariance

eventsFunctions.description: Change the angle variance (in degrees) applied to each bullet.
eventsFunctions.name: SetAngleVariance
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set angle variance of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ degrees

eventsFunctions.description: the bullet speed variance (pixels per second) applied to each bullet.
eventsFunctions.name: BulletSpeedVariance

eventsFunctions.description: Change the speed variance (pixels per second) applied to each bullet.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBulletSpeedVariance
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set bullet speed variance of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels per second

eventsFunctions.description: the number of bullets shot every time the "fire bullet" action is used.
eventsFunctions.name: BulletQuantity
eventsFunctions.sentence: the number of bullets per shot

eventsFunctions.description: Change the number of bullets shot every time the "fire bullet" action is used.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set number of bullets per shot (deprecated)
eventsFunctions.name: SetBulletQuantity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set number of bullets per shot of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the layer that bullets are created on.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBulletLayer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the layer used to create bullets fired by _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Enable bullet rotation.
eventsFunctions.name: SetRotateBullet

eventsFunctions.description: Enable unlimited ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: SetUnlimitedAmmo

eventsFunctions.description: the firing cooldown (in seconds) also known as rate of fire.
eventsFunctions.name: Cooldown

eventsFunctions.description: Change the firing cooldown, which changes the rate of fire.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCooldown
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the fire rate of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the reload duration (in seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: ReloadDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Change the duration to reload ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: SetReloadDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the reload duration of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the overheat duration (in seconds). When an object is overheated, it can't fire for this duration.
eventsFunctions.name: OverheatDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Change the duration after becoming overheated.
eventsFunctions.name: SetOverheatDuration
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the overheat duration of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: the ammo quantity.
eventsFunctions.name: AmmoQuantity

eventsFunctions.description: Change the quantity of ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: SetAmmoQuantity
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the ammo quantity of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: the heat increase per shot.
eventsFunctions.name: HeatIncreasePerShot

eventsFunctions.description: Change the heat increase per shot.
eventsFunctions.name: SetHeatPerShot
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the heat increase of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ per shot

eventsFunctions.description: the max ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxAmmo

eventsFunctions.description: Change the max ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMaxAmmo
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the max ammo of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Reset total shots fired.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetTotalShotsFired

eventsFunctions.description: Reset total bullets created.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetTotalBulletsCreated

eventsFunctions.description: Reset total reloads completed.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetTotalReloadsCompleted

eventsFunctions.description: the number of shots per reload.
eventsFunctions.name: ShotsPerReload

eventsFunctions.description: Change the number of shots per reload.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShotsPerReload
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the shots per reload of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) automatic reloading.
eventsFunctions.name: SetAutomaticReload

eventsFunctions.description: the linear cooling rate (per second).
eventsFunctions.name: LinearCoolingRate

eventsFunctions.description: Change the linear rate of cooling.
eventsFunctions.name: SetLinearCoolingRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the linear cooling rate of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ per second

eventsFunctions.description: the exponential cooling rate, per second.
eventsFunctions.name: ExponentialCoolingRate

eventsFunctions.description: Change the exponential rate of cooling.
eventsFunctions.name: SetExponentialCoolingRate
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the exponential cooling rate of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Increase ammo quantity.
eventsFunctions.name: IncreaseAmmo

events.comment: If Max Ammo is set, do not exceed the value

eventsFunctions.description: Layer that bullets are created on.
eventsFunctions.name: BulletLayer

eventsFunctions.description: the heat level (range: 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: HeatLevel

eventsFunctions.description: Total shots fired (multi-bullet shots are considered one shot).
eventsFunctions.name: TotalShotsFired

eventsFunctions.description: Total bullets created.
eventsFunctions.name: TotalBulletsCreated

eventsFunctions.description: Reloads completed.
eventsFunctions.name: TotalReloadsCompleted

eventsFunctions.description: the remaining shots before the next reload is required.
eventsFunctions.name: ShotsBeforeNextReload
eventsFunctions.sentence: the remaining shots (before the next reload)

eventsFunctions.description: the remaining duration before the cooldown will permit a bullet to be fired, in seconds.
eventsFunctions.name: CooldownTimeLeft
eventsFunctions.sentence: the remaining duration before the cooldown end

eventsFunctions.description: the remaining duration before the overheat penalty ends, in seconds.
eventsFunctions.name: OverheatTimeLeft
eventsFunctions.sentence: the remaining duration before the overheat end

eventsFunctions.description: Check if object is currently performing an ammo reload.
eventsFunctions.name: IsReloadInProgress

eventsFunctions.description: Check if object is ready to shoot.
eventsFunctions.name: IsReadyToShoot

eventsFunctions.description: Check if automatic reloading is enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: IsAutomaticReloadingEnabled

eventsFunctions.description: Check if ammo is unlimited.
eventsFunctions.name: IsUnlimitedAmmo

eventsFunctions.description: Check if object has no ammo available.
eventsFunctions.name: IsOutOfAmmo

eventsFunctions.description: Check if object needs to reload ammo.
eventsFunctions.name: IsReloadNeeded

events.comment: Shots per reload must not be "0"

eventsFunctions.description: Check if object is overheated.
eventsFunctions.name: IsOverheated

eventsFunctions.description: Check if firing cooldown is active.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFiringCooldownActive

propertyDescriptors.label: Firing cooldown
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects cannot shoot while firing cooldown is active.
propertyDescriptors.name: FireCooldown

propertyDescriptors.label: Rotate bullets to match their trajectory
propertyDescriptors.name: RotateBullet

propertyDescriptors.label: Firing arc
propertyDescriptors.description: Multi-Fire bullets will be evenly spaced inside the firing arc
propertyDescriptors.name: FiringArc

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of bullets created at once
propertyDescriptors.description: Multi-Fire bullets will be evenly spaced inside the firing arc
propertyDescriptors.name: BulletQuantity

propertyDescriptors.label: Bullet speed variance
propertyDescriptors.description: Bullet speed will be adjusted by a random value within this range.
propertyDescriptors.name: BulletSpeedVariance

propertyDescriptors.label: Reloading duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects cannot shoot while reloading is in progress.
propertyDescriptors.name: ReloadDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Total shots fired
propertyDescriptors.description: Regardless of how many bullets are created, only 1 shot will be counted per frame
propertyDescriptors.name: TotalShotsFired

propertyDescriptors.label: Heat increase per shot (between 0 and 1)
propertyDescriptors.description: Object is overheated when Heat reaches 1.
propertyDescriptors.name: HeatIncreasePerShot

propertyDescriptors.label: Overheat duration
propertyDescriptors.description: Object cannot shoot while overheat duration is active.
propertyDescriptors.name: OverheatDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Exponential cooling rate (per second)
propertyDescriptors.description: Happens faster when heat is high and slower when heat is low.
propertyDescriptors.name: ExponentialCoolingRate

propertyDescriptors.label: Layer the bullets are created on
propertyDescriptors.name: BulletLayer

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: BehaviorRemapper
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Quickly remap Behavior controls to different keys.
description: Make sure to disable default controls unless you want two keys to do the same action.
Actions have two versions. `custom` allow the movement keys to be changed to what ever you would like. `presets` provide a common key-bindings that can be selected from a list.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows for the controls of a Top-Down behavior to be re-mapped via a single action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForTopdown

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Top-Down behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Top-Down controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows for the controls of a platformer behavior to be re-mapped via a single action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RemapForPlatformer

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a custom control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a custom scheme
eventsFunctions.name: SetCustom
eventsFunctions.sentence: Remap controls of _PARAM0_: Up: _PARAM2_, Left: _PARAM3_, Down: _PARAM4_, Right: _PARAM5_, Jump: _PARAM6_

eventsFunctions.description: Remaps Platformer behavior controls to a preset control scheme.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remap Platformer controls to a preset
eventsFunctions.name: SetPreset

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: StayOnScreen
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Move the object to keep it visible on the screen.
description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
The shoot'em up example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://space-shooter)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: StayOnScreen

eventsFunctions.description: the top margin (in pixels) to leave between the object and the screen border.
eventsFunctions.name: MarginTop

eventsFunctions.description: the bottom margin (in pixels) to leave between the object and the screen border.
eventsFunctions.name: MarginBottom

eventsFunctions.description: the left margin (in pixels) to leave between the object and the screen border.
eventsFunctions.name: MarginLeft

eventsFunctions.description: the right margin (in pixels) to leave between the object and the screen border.
eventsFunctions.name: MarginRight
